function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limitation of the study to only architectural, urban, and public realm scales.","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on industries and economies","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global panic buying, food protectionism, and lockdowns","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Projected job losses and income reduction worldwide","category":"Lower
